DOC.brief_summary: The purpose cross-sectional survey study describe prevalence asthma Rhinitis symptom among secondary school student Saudi Arabia .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Asthma Rhinitis Symptoms Among Secondary School Students Saudi Arabia
DOC.detailed_description: Cross sectional survey base ISAAC protocol characterize symptom asthma rhinitis measure frequency prevalence among secondary school student ( age 15 18 year , boys girl ) Riyadh city , Saudi Arabia period 1st April 2010 31st May 2010 . The ISAAC protocol state study population consist least 3,000 student age 15-18 years- case , enrol least 40 randomly select school . The 15-18 year age group choose age adolescent go school regularly , make data collection easier . Once request research team , education authority provide list secondary school Riyadh city number student school grade . There 400 secondary school boys 400 school girl ( total number boy girls student 50,000 ) . A two stage stratify random sample 4000 student select secondary school boys girl , Their age range 16 18 year .
